titleStmt.title: CBETA電子佛典(量化分析版)
世尊聖者千眼千首千足千舌千臂觀自在菩提薩埵怛嚩廣大圓滿無礙大悲心陀羅尼
titleStmt.author: Dharma Drum Institute of Liberal Arts, Library and Information Center, Digital Archives Section 法鼓文理學院 圖書資訊館 數位典藏組

address.addrLine: 20842 新北市金山區法鼓路700號

body.ab: /世尊/聖者/千/眼/千/首/千/足/千/舌/千/臂/觀自在/菩提薩埵/怛嚩/廣大/圓滿/無礙/大悲/心/陀羅尼/

div.ab: 􇖵namoratnatrayāya􇟄namaḥāryavalokiteśvarāya bodhisatvāya mahāsatvāya mahākāruṇikāya makāvīrāya sahasrākṣāya sahasraśīṣāyasahasrapadaya sahasrajidvāya sahasrabhujāya ehibhagavaṃ nāryāvalokiteśvara ugraatmagra mahāugramahānāda kilikilikilikilimilimilimili cilicilicilicilinaṭunaṭunaṭunaṭu krasakrasakrasakrasa kurukurukurukuru ehyehi mahāvīra valaṃdadavīryaṃdadasavaṃ kāmaṃme prayacchaśīghraṃ vaśaṃmerāṣṭra sarājakaṃkuru sahasrabhuja sahasravīra lokeśvara sādhaya sadāsiddhiṃmebhava dharadobhavaagrobhavāmi oṃnamostute bhagavaṃtnāryāvalokiteścara prapudhyaprasīdamaḥvaradomama bhavāhi svāhā􇖴
